snippet: The Milwaukee Brewers got an important game back from the St. Louis Cardinals, their division rivals, after losing the first two in the series.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Milwaukee Brewers defeat St Louis Cardinals, 5-1; other baseball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Milwaukee Brewers got an important game back from the St. Louis Cardinals, their division rivals, after losing the first two in the series.

headline.main: Brewers Avoid Sweep Against Cardinals; Braves Starter Holds Phillies to 3 Hits
headline.print_headline: Brewers Avoid Sweep Against Cardinals; Braves Starter Holds Phillies to 3 Hits
